extendedInfo.description: ***WARNING PLEASE READ FIRST***This is the live wallpaper of the stick a needle in an eye death from the game dead space 2 for the ps3 and xbox 360This live wallpaper was created for the DROID x and has NOT been tested on any other devices!There is an option to change the size to small, med, large (use large for droid x)There is an option to change FPS my recommended setting (at least what I use) is 23 FPS

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Force close when I try to open it. Galaxy s2. A refund would be appreciated
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes everytime.
reviews.comment: Needs to be compatible with more phones
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on my phone. Framerate is good at 40 and big size.
reviews.author: A Google User
